effect.en: Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
effect.fr: Choisissez l’un des Pokémon de votre adversaire. Cette attaque inflige 20 dégâts à ce Pokémon. (N’appliquez ni la Faiblesse ni la Résistance aux Pokémon de Banc.)

description.en: It is a well-established symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
